Meeting.text: You here only for helping people.
...Yes you won't get anything for that...
People need you to save their island
So, go stray and defeat all enemies on your way
Well.. you already have that dull knife... use it..
WHAT !?! YOU DON'T KNOW HOW TO USE A KNIFE ??!
*sigh* Damn we really shouldnt expect someone to help us...

Attacking is probably the SIMPLEST thing one could do:
just press <SPACE or C or X or Z> followed by the directions you facing.
*angry voice* Hey ! Don't look at me like I'm a tutorial NPC !

I just dont want to see you die that fast 
seeing you dying strait away wouldn't be as entertaining *chortling*.
